title: Quanneng Gaoshou
synopsis:
"I came from the wilderness, raised by five incredibly powerful grandparents. To uncover the truth behind my parents' murder, I return to the city." Watch as this young hero, skilled in martial arts, music, chess, medicine, and cooking, feigns weakness to outsmart others, surrounded by beautiful women, rises against all odds, solves a shocking mystery, and vows to become the city's all-around master, the undisputed ruler of this land!

(Source: iQIYI, translated)
